document.heading: Merit Personnel Early Out Retirement Revisions Amendment Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-122, the “Merit Personnel Early Out Retirement Revisions Amendment Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-226, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 6, 1996, and March, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 15, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-229 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D. C. Law 11-122 became effective on May 24, 1996.
